course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Culture and Environment
course.description: This introductory course aims to study the relationship between "culture" and the "environment" and the impacts of cultural mechanisms on resource management, population and health practices in different cultural settings. Some topics about human adaptive strategies, such as types of production and consumption in different societies related to horticulture, maritime, pastoralism and labor intensive agriculture will be discussed.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in LANG 1401 OR LANG 1402 OR LANG 1403 OR LANG 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: nyx
reviews.title: Heavy workload for a common core
reviews.comment_content:
Detailed history of interaction of various tribes with environment, how it has impacted culture, agriculture, lifestyle etc

Some will cover geographical information, while some topics are more go in depth about different tribe lifestyle - talking about their eating habits, customs and traditions.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The content is very boring, however the prof does to make in interesting by asking questions to the class and showing videos about the topic he's going to explain.

He makes sure to translate to the international students if he talks in mandarin or about Chinese culture.
reviews.comment_grading:
I got an A.
I tried my best to summarise the imp points in my reading report. A final paper was submitted instead of an exam.
My group just had to submit a presentation - we didn't even have to present it in front of the class.
Answer questions in class to get bonus points. There is no right answer as it more like a discussion and contribution counts. Attendance is also counted
reviews.comment_workload:
Quite a heavy workload, as there is 1 reading report every week - and some of the reading material is long and boring to go through

1 presentation and a final paper as the rest of the sem was shifted to online classes

reviews.author: soy
reviews.title: 香港人geh感受
reviews.comment_content:
(唔想睇英文geh 下面有Google translate 中文版)

mainly about agriculture and the relationship of how the environment changes the personalities/behavior of a people.

Only some of the topics are interesting:
two groups of people with the same ancestor were separated into two places, one with poor living conditions, those people become crude and solve problems by fighting. The other one living in an island stay mild and gentle. In the end, the cruder group slaughtered the other group.

主要是關於農業以及
環境如何改變人們的性格/行為的關係。

只有一些主題很有趣：
兩組具有相同祖先的人被分為兩個地方，其中一個人的生活條件較差，這些人變得粗暴，無法通過戰鬥解決問題。 另一個住在島上的人保持溫和和溫和。 最後，較粗暴的小組屠殺了另一小組。

very boring
超悶

reviews.author: Sharis
reviews.title: It's a fun course with huge workload
reviews.comment_content: This course made me know a lot more about different cultures of other tribes. It's fun for people who likes history.
reviews.comment_teaching:
His powerpoint were tidy but unclear.
He is a nice professor and he explained lots of examples that makes it easier to understand.
TA is also very helpful and kind.
reviews.comment_grading: He gave nice grades. Although he never publish the distribution of the grades, I had my first A in my life XD.
reviews.comment_workload:
There were reading materials which were very long every week and required us to hand in a reading response.
Although we canceled the final exam, we needed to submit a final report.
